title: Maruti Cars: You just missed saving Rs 25,000 on Maruti Swift as company raises car prices
description: Maruti Suzuki announced significant price hikes for Maruti Swift and Grand Vitara variants. Swift prices increased by up to Rs 25,000 and Grand Vitara Sigma by Rs 19,000, effective immediately from April 10, 2024. Maruti's shares fell 1.6% to Rs 12,683.65 on BSE Sensex. The carmaker, along with other industry players, has been raising prices consistently in response to inflation and higher commodity costs.
